wormbase 0.2.9

Peptides

Source: R/ftp-peptides.R
peptides.Rd

Peptides

peptides(version = getOption(x = "wormbase.version", default = NULL),
  BPPARAM = BiocParallel::bpparam())

Arguments

version

character(1) or NULL. WormBase version. If NULL (recommended), defaults to current production release version available on the WormBase website. Legacy versions can be specified as a character string (e.g. "WS262").

Value

SplitDataFrameList. Split by geneID column.

Note

Updated 2019-08-28.

Examples

## WormBase FTP server must be accessible.
tryCatch(
    expr = peptides(),
    error = function(e) e
)
